instruction: Generate a list of out-of-the-box anniversary gift ideas for a couple.
output:
- Dinner at a new restaurant in town 
- Hire a photographer for a date night photoshoot 
- Plan a weekend getaway to a romantic spot 
- Recreate their first date 
- Take a cooking class together
- Surprise them with a home spa night
- Take a dance class 
- Have a picnic at a chosen spot
- Get tickets to a live event together
- Visit a place they have always wanted to go 
- Go stargazing or take a night hike 
- Do a wine tasting or craft beer tour 
- Drive to a nearby destination for the day 
- Write a love letter for each other 
- Give a personalized photo album 
- Buy a board game or jigsaw puzzle 
- Take a helicopter tour 
- Take a road trip 
- Make a photo collage of your memories together
- Get tickets to a virtual escape room experience
